attributes.action: Sanction the re-assessment of young peoples EMA entitlement when family finances require it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently young people aged 16-18 in full time education can apply for EMA payments.  The assessment is based on the previous years income, however, more and more children are falling into hardship as their parents are being made redundant.  Currently the young person can't be reassessed during the year even if their circumstances change dramatically.  I strongly urge the Government to change this policy.
